pages.text: When a Fey passes into the next world, they leave behind a small amount of Fey Dust. Breaking the fey trees will also provide you with fey dust. Fey Dust is also obtained by heating up fey ore.

pages.title: Fey Dust
pages.text: Some believe the magical powder gives the power of flight to whoever it is sprinkled on. A boy once ate a whole stack and he was 'never' seen again.
